value.0:
Tourmaline can be found in a wide variety of colors, the more common being pale shades of blue, brown, gold, green, pink, red, and silver pearl. White or colorless tourmaline was called waterstar. If multiple colors occurred in the same crystal, it was known as rainbow tourmaline and was priced in the higher precious stone range.Black tourmaline is called ravenar and is considered a gem stone. 

Tourmalines are considered sacred by followers of Deneir appropriate for sacrifice, or to be consecrated for use, or recognized as boons or omens when found. The rainbow variety of tourmaline is sacred to followers of Mystra.
